mapper.select: SELECT NUM , SERIAL , CONTENT , REG_ID , REG_DT , EDIT_DT FROM PD_REPLY WHERE SERIAL = #{serial} ORDER BY REG_DT DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PD_REPLY ( SERIAL, CONTENT, REG_ID, REG_DT, EDIT_DT ) VALUES ( #{serial}, #{content}, #{reg_id}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE PD_REPLY SET CONTENT = #{content}, EDIT_DT = now() WHERE num = #{num}
